DOC.brief_summary: In this study we investigate the following properties of the transversus abdominis plane block in healthy volunteers: 1. Cutaneous analgesic distribution 2. Muscular affection 3. Reproducibility
DOC.brief_title: A Study Investigating Properties of the Transversus Abdominis Plane Block
DOC.criteria: Capable American society of anesthesiologists classification 1 or 2 Written informed consent Age below 18 years American society of anesthesiologists classification above 2 Body weight below 50 kg Body mass index > 35 kg/m2 Previous abdominal surgery Acute or chronic pain Use of pain medication less than 24 h prior to study start Allergy to local anesthetics Pregnancy Breastfeeding
